hero.title: Survive and Thrive in Rune Slayer
hero.description:
Rune Slayer is an immersive open-world RPG on Roblox.
Create allies in Rune Slayer and grow stronger to survive in the wild.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Rune Slayer Game
introduce.label: Introduce Rune Slayer
introduce.description: Rune Slayer is an immersive open-world RPG experience on Roblox where players forge alliances and strengthen their characters to survive in a dangerous wilderness. The world of Rune Slayer is filled with mystical runes that grant extraordinary powers to those who can master them. Join Rune Slayer today!

items.title: Rune Slayer Character Development
items.description: Create a unique character in Rune Slayer with different races and classes, each with distinct abilities and playstyles.

items.title: Rune Slayer Open World Adventure
items.description: Explore a vast Rune Slayer world filled with quests, monsters, and hidden treasures.

items.title: Rune Slayer Complex Combat
items.description: Master Rune Slayer's skill-based combat system with attacks, blocks, and special abilities.

usage.name: gameplay
usage.title: How To Play Rune Slayer
usage.description: Master the basics of Rune Slayer and become a legendary Rune Slayer adventurer in four steps:

items.title: Create Your Rune Slayer Character
items.description: Begin with a random race in Rune Slayer and choose your starting class. Each offers unique abilities and playstyles.

items.title: Complete Rune Slayer Quests
items.description: Take on Rune Slayer quests from NPCs (yellow question marks) or the Adventurer's Guild board for rewards.

items.title: Master Rune Slayer Game Systems
items.description: Learn Rune Slayer fishing, crafting, pet taming, and combat mechanics to survive and thrive in the world.

items.title: Join The Rune Slayer Community
items.description: Team up with other Rune Slayer players, join guilds, and participate in PvP to become a legend.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Why Rune Slayer Will Captivate You
feature.description: Choose your Rune Slayer character class wisely based on your playstyle

items.title: Rune Slayer Dynamic Open World
items.description: Explore diverse Rune Slayer landscapes filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and breathtaking vistas

items.title: Rune Slayer Deep Progression System
items.description: Develop your Rune Slayer character through multiple classes, skills, and gear upgrades

items.title: Rune Slayer Strategic Combat
items.description: Master Rune Slayer's skill-based combat system where timing, positioning, and technique matter

items.title: Rune Slayer Rich Crafting Economy
items.description: Gather resources in Rune Slayer, discover recipes, and forge powerful equipment

items.title: Rune Slayer Thrilling Pet System
items.description: Tame over 15 different creatures in Rune Slayer with unique abilities to aid your adventures

items.title: Rune Slayer Balanced PvP Experience
items.description: Test your skills against other players in high-stakes Rune Slayer encounters

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Rune Slayer
faq.description: Have another question about Rune Slayer? Join our Rune Slayer Discord or visit the Rune Slayer community Trello board.

items.title: How do I reset my bounty in Rune Slayer?
items.description: Visit Lockmeier NPC outside the Wayshire Inn in Rune Slayer to reset your bounty. Low bounties cost a few silver coins, while higher bounties may cost several gold coins.

items.title: What are the best races to choose in Rune Slayer?
items.description: While races in Rune Slayer are initially randomly assigned, the top-tier races include Dullahan, Slime, Ailuran, and Elf. You can reroll your Rune Slayer race for 150 Robux if desired.

items.title: How does the pet taming system work in Rune Slayer?
items.description: Different Rune Slayer pets require specific items to tame. For example, Slimes need Slime Chunks, Deer need Apples, and Wolves need Raw Deer Meat. There's a 5-minute cooldown between taming attempts in Rune Slayer, which resets upon player death.

items.title: What's the best class for beginners in Rune Slayer?
items.description: Priest (S-tier) is considered the best overall Rune Slayer class due to powerful healing abilities. For combat-focused beginners in Rune Slayer, Striker (A-tier) offers good damage and PvP capabilities, while Archer (A-tier) is excellent for ranged combat and PvE content.

items.title: How do I start fishing in Rune Slayer?
items.description: Purchase a fishing rod and bait from Simon The Fisherman south of Wayshire in Rune Slayer. Equip the rod, cast your line, and click when you see ripples on the water surface. Different Rune Slayer baits have varying consumption chances.

items.title: How does the crafting system work in Rune Slayer?
items.description: Basic copper items can be crafted at the blacksmith NPC east of Wayshire in Rune Slayer. Use furnaces to create ingots and crafting tables for advanced items. New recipes unlock as you discover resources in the Rune Slayer world.
